element.name: config
element.label: Configuration Descriptor
element.key: Short Gogen path (coccyx/weblog for example), full file path,local file in config directory, or URL pointing to YAML or JSON config. Leave blank to use all configs in gogen_assets.

element.name: config_type
element.label: Configuration Descriptor Type
element.key: The type of config defined in the Configuration Descriptor field. Defaults to config_dir.

opt.label: Use gogen_assets as a config directory

element.name: count
element.label: Count
element.key: Count of events to generate every interval. Overrides any amounts set in the Gogen config

element.name: gogen_interval
element.label: Interval
element.key: Generate events every interval seconds. Overrides any interval set in the Gogen config

element.name: end_intervals
element.label: End Intervals
element.key: Generate events for endIntervals and stop. Overrides any endInterval set in the Gogen config

element.name: begin
element.label: Begin
element.key: Start generating events at begin time. Can use Splunk's relative time syntax or an absolute time. Overrides any begin setting in the Gogen config

element.name: end
element.label: End
element.key: End generating events at end time. Can use Splunk's relative time syntax or an absolute time. Overrides any end setting in the Gogen config
